title.rendered: H.E. Geoffrey Onyeama attended the formal presentation of the book “Humility In Diplomacy” authored by Amb. Bello Husseini Kazaure, Chief of Protocol of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs

content.rendered:
The Hon. Minister of Foreign Affairs, H.E. Geoffrey Onyeama attended the formal presentation of the book “Humility In Diplomacy” authored by Amb. Bello Husseini Kazaure, Chief of Protocol of the YOUWIN Connecttoday, 30th March, 2023.
The event was attended by some Cabinet Ministers, Royal Fathers, Family of the celebrant, Senior Government Officials, Members of the Diplomatic Corps, and Captains of Industries, among other dignitaries.
